name: Villains
overview: Villains was the feature game on the Micro User cassette of September 1984. It was also available to download from the BBC CEEFAX service in March 1988. The object of the game is to prevent your four lithium energy crystals from being stolen by villains intent on your destruction. You also have to defend yourself against repeated attacks from assassins and Hugo, the mad professor. Your only weapon is a laser blaster.
